name: KokoRob (GameJam)
description:
Play as KokoRob, a malfunctioning robot-child that needs to keep moving to survive!

Don't let the enemy robots get you, or they'll hold you and that's no good.

Hit the robots to add to your combo amount, regain health and give yourself a small break. However, if you keep attacking, you'll run out of stamina, and you'll have to take a breath.

Instructions:

  • Move with Left Stick/WASD
  • Attack with ABXY/Arrow Keys
  • Accept with Start/Space
  • Pause with Start/Escape

#GMTKJam submission. Developed by CerosWare.
